title: Farm Game Sound Effects
description: Farm Game includes 1000 SFX – Create cute & cozy farming sound design & atmospheres at light speed with Farm Game, a casual farming simulation sound effects library inspired by Stardew Valley & the Sims.
longDescription:
Click HERE for SoundCloud Demo!

Click HERE for YouTube Demo!


Build Your Own Slice of Country Paradise 

Build your own slice of country paradise with a slew of wholesome sound athletics of modern-day farming games. With Farm Game, you can easily decorate, build, fish, swim, produce goods, and customize your farm fast & efficiently. Inside you’ll see & hear a variety of high-quality sound effects like farm animals, tools, engines, fishing sounds, water, whooshes, plants, notifications & UI. Get busy at the farm, tend to your animals, go swimming, supply the townsfolk with fresh milk, chop wood, plant crops, garden, decorate your home, make friends, go fishing, ride your tractor, manage your farming empire & much more.


Tell Compelling Rural Stories Through Farm Sound Effects! 

Hop on the tractor for a ride to fantastic & fun farming game sound design. Everything is organized into understandable folder structures: Animals, Farming, Fishing, Footsteps, Household, Loops, Menu, Notifications, Water, & Whooshes. Most folder structures have sound-type subfolders making it easy to find what you are looking for. 


What’s included:

You’ll get sounds effects for farm animals like cows, goats, sheep, pig, mouse, rat, chicken, rooster, dog, bat, duck, elk, llama, human voice, blow torch, trash can, swimming, tractor sounds, crops, harvesting SFX, plants, engines, contraptions, hand tools, whooshes, fishing poles, lures, water, gardening sounds, dirt, digging, shovels, buckets, buttons, farm-ified user interface, collects, items, pickups, footsteps on 9 surfaces, nature loops, room tones, barn doors, phones, inventory slots, tackle boxes, building sounds, place, demolish, notifications, alerts, hammers, hatchets, mining, cows, goats, chickens, lamb, mechanical loops, wheels & much more.
technicalDetails:
Product Details:

  • 1014 sound effects & loops
  • 507 designed game ready casual farm game sound effects
  • 507 source/organic sound effects – build your own animated farm sounds or sweeten
  • Over 94 minutes of game audio & SFX
  • Over 995 MB of audio samples
  • All in 44.1k/16-Bit WAV Audio File Format
  • Includes Soundminer metadata for easy search capability
  • Certified organic & great for casual, farming games, scenes & cartoon productions
  • 101 animal sounds – cow, goat, horse, frog, sheep, rat, chicken, bat, dog, cat, pig & more
  • 23 gibberish & country guy voice-over files
  • 387 farming sounds – harvests, crops, planting, seeds, notifications, doors, construction, dirt, digging, engines, wagon & more.
  • 107 fishing sounds – add bait, cast, reel, poles, lures, attachments, notifications, water splashes
  • 73 footstep sets – dirt, grass, hooves, metal, sand, snow, stone, water, wood
  • And much more!

Number of Audio Waves: 1014

Number of Audio Cues: 1014

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz

Do Sound FX loop: Yes, some

Minutes of audio provided: 94 min

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
